overview:
Fernando Mateus Fernandez edit Fernando is a tech entrepreneur with a lot of ideas and energy to ambitious life-transforming projects.

Currently is working with the bioPing team developing an interesting project, maybe the most advanced tool for creating a personal profile page (http://bioPing.me).

Previously he also founded aquaMobile http://www.aquaMobile.es where he use to work as CTO and Business Development Co-Manager. aquaMobileÂ´s flagship product is CLIC2CÂ® . Fernando was in charge of the product development using an array of state-of-art technologies: Digital Watermarking, Mobile Apps and online Platforms.
